tasks.label: Build and Run Online Kitapçı
args: Write-Host 'Starting Online Kitapçı Application...' -ForegroundColor Green; cd kitapMagazaApi; Start-Process powershell -ArgumentList '-NoExit', '-Command', 'dotnet run --urls=https://localhost:7000;http://localhost:7001' -WindowStyle Normal; Start-Sleep 5; cd ../kitapMagazaMvc; Start-Process powershell -ArgumentList '-NoExit', '-Command', 'dotnet run --urls=https://localhost:5001;http://localhost:5000' -WindowStyle Normal; Write-Host 'API: https://localhost:7000/swagger' -ForegroundColor Yellow; Write-Host 'MVC: https://localhost:5001' -ForegroundColor Yellow

tasks.label: HTTP Build and Run Kitap Mağazası
args: Write-Host 'Starting Kitap Mağazası Application with HTTP...' -ForegroundColor Green; cd kitapMagazaApi; Start-Process powershell -ArgumentList '-NoExit', '-Command', 'dotnet run --urls=http://localhost:7001' -WindowStyle Normal; Start-Sleep 5; cd ../kitapMagazaMvc; Start-Process powershell -ArgumentList '-NoExit', '-Command', 'dotnet run --urls=http://localhost:5000' -WindowStyle Normal; Write-Host 'API: http://localhost:7001/swagger' -ForegroundColor Yellow; Write-Host 'MVC: http://localhost:5000' -ForegroundColor Yellow
